snippet: Adis Medunjanin, 28, who was convicted of plotting with two friends to carry out a coordinated suicide attack on New York City subways, was sentenced to life in prison on Friday.
abstract: Adis Medunjanin, who was convicted of plotting with two friends to carry out a coordinated suicide attack on New York City subways, is sentenced to life in prison.
lead_paragraph: Adis Medunjanin, 28, who was convicted of plotting with two friends to carry out a coordinated suicide attack on New York City subways, was sentenced to life in prison on Friday.

headline.seo: Medunjanin, Convicted of Subway Bomb Plot, Gets Life Sentence
headline.main: Man Convicted of a Terrorist Plot to Bomb Subways Is Sent to Prison for Life
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of a Terrorist Plot to Bomb Subways Is Sent to Prison for Life
